page.title: 07SHOPS IN WELWYN GARDEN CITY
page.content: Welwyn Garden City was the second Garden City in England. It was one of the first planned towns to be constructed after the First World War and was designed by Ebenezer Howard. As Welwyn Garden City is a modern town there are many facilities for everyone, old or young. In each small community or "neighbourhood" in Welwyn Garden City there are activities going on during the week. The town centre has various shops ranging from food to clothes. The main store in Welwyn Garden is John Lewis; this has recently opened following the closure of Welwyn Department Store. John Lewis has a wide range of departments in itself, from household goods to a small chemist. There is also a cafe, men's hairdressers and a travel agent in John Lewis.
